headline: GE Vernova Weighs Prolec GE Deal And Electrification Growth Prospects
summary: GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) is moving to acquire Prolec GE, with the deal approaching closure following its recent spin-off from General Electric. The company is using the transaction to expand its presence in global electrification markets and broaden its international footprint. Management is pairing the acquisition with order growth in Electrification and Power and increased R&D spending to support its stand-alone strategy. For you as an investor, GE Vernova sits at the intersection of power...

headline: GE Vernova price target raised to $780 from $680 at TD Cowen
summary: TD Cowen raised the firm’s price target on GE Vernova (GEV) to $780 from $680 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. headline: GE Vernova Q4 gas turbine orders surge 74%
summary: Wind turbine orders increased 8% in 2024 — mainly outside the U.S. — despite the Trump administration’s efforts to stifle offshore wind development.

headline: Dow Jones Futures Fall With Trump Fed Pick Due; Apple Rises, Tesla Pops, Sandisk Soars
summary: Software stocks dived Thursday but the key indexes rallied back above key levels, with Google and Nvidia in buy areas. Apple and Sandisk rose late on earnings.
